AD_Customer.synopsis: Summary: A citizen has just bought an item at Devil’s fee and is trying to follow its instructions to activate its enchantment. They keep getting tongue twisted. Reference to Beetlegeuse

Customer_0.speaker: Nelburn Frust
Customer_0.text: Scarab sap, scarab sap, scarab spat - look, you're really not helping.
Customer_0.context: NodeContext: keeps messing up saying "scarab sap" three times in a row
